mapper.update: update eb_store_service set mer_id = #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, notify = #{notify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, mer_id, uid, avatar, nickname, add_time, status, notify, ctime from eb_store_service
